data.title: Nabi Discontinues StaphVax After Confirmatory Phase III Trial Fails
data.meta_description: Nabi Biopharmaceuticals is halting development of its Staphylococcus aureus vaccine StaphVax after the product's failure to show efficacy in a 3,600-patient confirmatory trial
